author: julianfoad
msg: In tests for failing hook scripts, include non-XML-safe characters in the
hook failure messages in order to regression-test issue #3553 ("mod_dav_svn
not XML-escaping hook error messages"). Also simplify the test code a little.
Include non-XML-safe characters in the hook failure message.  In the
latter two tests, simplify the code by using the existing function
